structured_data.overview: This content covers the status of El Segundo's Housing Element, which was certified on July 15, 2024, after completing required rezoning. It also discusses the Affordable Housing Strategy implementation, upcoming and past events related to housing, and explains what a Housing Element and Regional Housing Needs Assessment (RHNA) are.

structured_data.other_info: The City's Regional Housing Needs Assessment (RHNA) allocation is 492 units across various income levels: 189 very low income, 88 low income, 84 moderate income, and 131 above moderate income units. The Housing Element is one of nine state-mandated elements of the City's General Plan and must identify housing needs, establish goals and policies, identify adequate sites for housing, and be certified by the State Department of Housing and Community Development.
